Content

Here is some description...

Headings and Paragraph

All the headings default to $weight-medium font weight with browser default margins.

h1. Heading

h2. Heading

h3. Heading

h4. Heading

h5. Heading
h6. Heading

p. Paragraph

Paragraph Small Text

                                <h1>h1. Heading</h1>
<h2>h2. Heading</h2>
<h3>h3. Heading</h3>
<h4>h4. Heading</h4>
<h5>h5. Heading</h5>
<h6>h6. Heading</h6>
<p>p. Paragraph</p>
<p>Paragraph <small>Small Text</small></p>

Titles

Titles (.title-*) and Subtitles (.subtitle-*) can be used in different combinations to add depth to your page.

Title 1

Subtitle 3

Title 2

Subtitle 4

Title 3

Subtitle 5

Title 4

Subtitle 6

                            <p class="title-1">Title 1</p>
<p class="subtitle-3">Subtitle 3</p>
<p class="title-2">Title 2</p>
<p class="subtitle-4">Subtitle 4</p>
<p class="title-3">Title 3</p>
<p class="subtitle-5">Subtitle 5</p>
<p class="title-4">Title 4</p>
<p class="subtitle-6">Subtitle 6</p>
